step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you roll them down.
Great job completing the first rep! Remember to breathe deeply as you roll back.
Second rep starting well. Try to initiate the roll from your shoulder blades.
Good control here. Ensure both shoulders move in a smooth, circular path.
Excellent finish to the second rep! You're doing great with shoulder mobility.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to inhale deeply when rolling back to help with breathing and oxygen flow. Keep up the good work!
